Implementation and Installation Guide - v1.0

2. Environment Setup

3. Installation Steps

AI Content Generation Endpoint

This section details the new AI content generation endpoint.

  • Endpoint: /ai/generate
  • Method: POST
  • Functionality: Generates technical writing content based on user prompts.
  • Input: A text prompt from the frontend.
  • Output: A JSON response containing the generated text.
  • Logging: All prompts and generated text are logged for analysis and monitoring.
  • Error Handling: Returns appropriate HTTP status codes for failures or invalid input.

Document Editor UI

This section describes the implementation of the document editor user interface.

  • Technology: React, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui
  • Features:
    • Rich text editor for creating and editing documents.
    • Toolbar with formatting options:
      • Bold
      • Lists
      • Headings
  • User Interface:
    • Responsive design.
    • Dark mode support.
  • Save Operations:
    • Visual feedback during save operations (loading spinners, success toasts).
    • Integration with the backend for loading and saving content.

User Registration API

This section outlines the new user registration API.

  • Endpoint: /register
  • Method: POST
  • Input Parameters:
    • email: Unique email address.
    • password: Minimum 8 characters.
    • displayName: Userâ€™s display name.
  • Security:
    • Password hashing using bcrypt.
  • Output:
    • On successful registration, returns a signed JWT token.
  • Logging: All registration events are logged for auditing and monitoring.
